1.0.name: wordpress/embad
1.0.description:
embAD Embed and control ads in your site using a powerful yet simple drag & drop interface , which will give you the abillity to scale advertisement and position ads almost anywhere on your site. So you'll be able to place advertisements in your site with simplicity and ease.

Features:

  • Simple integration, no messy configuration... advertising with ease.
  • Place and forget, Place an advertisement in one page and embAD will fit it to your theme in other pages on your site.
  • Easy to use.
  • No coding needed.

Want to know more about embAd? Check out our video or try it yourself in our demo page.
